name: Stoat Music Game - Alpha build
description:
This was my first project that I made for 2017.  It took much longer than I would of liked and due to various excuses in my life I spent way too long on this.  I initially wanted to make this game to be the first game I would release for mobile.  Sadly, I made a decision in the end to not finish the product or release this to mobile.

The artwork was made by myself but the music was obtained from https://www.bensound.com/.
